QuestionText: Which of the following models allows multiple tenants to share resources in cloud computing?
What is the main characteristic of Platform as a Service (PaaS)?
OptionA: It offers virtualized computing resources over the internet.
OptionB: It provides software applications on a subscription basis.
OptionC: It provides a platform allowing developers to build and deploy applications.
OptionD: It combines both public and private cloud models.
CorrectAnswer: It provides a platform allowing developers to build and deploy applications.

QuestionText: Which technology enables high speed data transfer between servers in a cloud environment?
What is the main purpose of a Content Delivery Network (CDN) in cloud computing?
OptionA: To monitor and manage virtual machines
OptionB: To optimize the delivery of static and dynamic web content
OptionC: To enforce secure logins for cloud services
CorrectAnswer: To optimize the delivery of static and dynamic web content

QuestionText: Which type of cloud offers enhanced security by restricting access to a single organization?
Which of the following is an advantage of cloud computing?
What does the term ‘elasticity’ signify in cloud computing?
OptionB: Ability to scale computing resources up or down as needed
CorrectAnswer: Ability to scale computing resources up or down as needed

QuestionText: Which deployment model of cloud computing combines both private and public cloud features?
Which of the following is not a type of cloud service model?
Which protocol is commonly used for file transfer in cloud environments?
